technicalevents.title: Paper Bestoval
technicalevents.bref: A paper presentaion event where students of solo or a team can present their paper on advanced technology related to engineering topics

technicalevents.title: Ideathon
technicalevents.bref: Participant should present about their Project idea in way of PPT or there deployed project can be showcased respectively.

technicalevents.title: Code Olympia
technicalevents.bref: First round contains basic coding problems.participant who shotlisted from first round participant will give with medium level problems in 2nd round.shortlisted participant move to next round...

technicalevents.title: Koda Chrome
technicalevents.bref: Participant should develop a website with the topic. Shortlist will be based on Developed design.
technicalevents.notes: on spot Topic and Users can use any technologies

technicalevents.title: Think Genius
technicalevents.bref: It will be contest based on MCQ Type Questions. Image related questions to test your IQ

nontechnicalevents.title: Ink and Imagination
nontechnicalevents.bref: Paper painting , brushless painting , plastic plate painting

nontechnicalevents.title: Film Fights
nontechnicalevents.bref: Abstract should be sent before the event based on the given topic and the film should be projected during the event day
nontechnicalevents.notes: Duration of Short film around 2 to 3 minutes

nontechnicalevents.title: Picture Perfect
nontechnicalevents.bref: The Participant should take photographs around the college campus. The participant take photograph based on the given topic .

nontechnicalevents.title: Marketing Master
nontechnicalevents.bref: It's an Advertising event.Advertising based on Exploring our events and promoting the events or college to the participants
